questions.question: Why is frame sampling important in video AI?
options: It reduces computational cost by processing representative frames
questions.explanation: Processing every frame is prohibitively expensive. Sampling selects key frames that capture the important information.

questions.question: Temporal consistency — ensuring objects don't flicker or morph — is a solved problem in video AI.
questions.explanation: Temporal consistency remains one of the biggest challenges in video AI, especially for generation and tracking tasks.

questions.question: Action recognition in video involves:
options: Identifying what text appears on screen
Classifying what physical actions or activities are occurring
questions.explanation: Action recognition identifies human activities (walking, running, cooking) by analyzing motion patterns across video frames.
